column5: Hi guys. I was wondering if someone could tell me if the ice is off the lakes up there? I leave next tuesday for a week of pike but ive been hearing conflicting reports on ice out and water levels. Either way im going but any help on this would be greatly appreciated. Thank you
from the satellite pics, it looks like you'll be fine, most lakes wide open, a little ice on Nighthawk, Abitibi is covered but looking close to melting
Thanks a lot guys! I guess the ranger is gonna get a workout on the trails... Looks good on er.
Gallie, post a report when you get back, I would love to read it

The water on Lake Kenogami and Lake Sessiginika (both along Hwy. 11N) will be open by the time you get there. Herbie the Volkswagon Beetle that sits out on Lake Kenogami went through the ice around midnight on May 5th.
Definitely, ive been looking forward too gettin a report up but all ive done so far is crappie and sucker
Good news I'm heading up to kap for the weekafter the opener, hopefully we lay a beating on them like we did last year. Report will definitely follow.
I took a drive by kipawa today and it ls completely open as of about late last week so you should be hitting ice out beautifully up there
Im at camp and there is no ice on the river.. and VERY little snow left in the bush.
TJ,  This is the spring of 2013,,who knows about next week?
